headline: Ford’s Shift From EVs to Hybrids and Gas Models Might Change The Case For Investing In Ford (F)
summary: In recent months, Ford Motor has reported its best fourth quarter and annual sales since 2019, outpacing the broader auto industry for 10 consecutive months while shifting its U.S. product focus toward gasoline and hybrid vehicles and away from loss-making electric models such as the F-150 Lightning. At the same time, Ford is working to sharpen its brand and operations, from repositioning Lincoln’s headquarters in Detroit to quality-related recalls and dealer-focused digital investments,...
